actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 by providing that the term "migrant worker" excludes any individual who returns to his place of permanent residence on a daily basis.

summary.text: Amends the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to add to the definition of "migrant worker" the requirement that an individual's employment necessitates travel of a kind which prevents such individual from returning to his permanent residence on a daily basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 by providing that the term "migrant worker" excludes any individual who returns to his place of permanent residence on a daily basis.
